profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.8.3 Artifacts - Structure element type
profile.description: Each structure element dictionary in the structure hierarchy shall have a Type entry with the name value of StructElem
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: Each structure element dictionary in the structure hierarchy shall have a Type entry with the name value of StructElem

error.message: Missing or invalid Type entry in the structure element dictionary
